eu.nerdz.api

Interface Application

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Board, Messenger
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ReverseApplication, ReverseMessenger

    public interface Application
    Interface representing a basic NerdzApi application. The Application contains login information, and takes care internally of validating access to the NERDZ website.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getUserID()
      Gets the current user ID.
      java.lang.String getUsername()
      Gets the username associated with this Application instance during the login process.

    • Method Detail

      • getUsername

        java.lang.String getUsername()
        Gets the username associated with this Application instance during the login process.
        Returns:
        a valid NERDZ username (without any kind of escaping)

      • getUserID

        int getUserID()
        Gets the current user ID.
        Returns:
        a valid user ID, representing this Application user.
